name: Electric Sheep: A Cyberpunk Dystopia
description:
Enter the world of ‘Electric Sheep: A Cyberpunk Dystopia’, one where society teeters on the brink of apocalyptic anarchy.
In the near future, humanity has been minimalized, as the rise of android-rule crushes any threats to its near-term dominance.
As part of the resistance, it’s your goal to undermine the automated dictatorship, and help free mankind from its robotic bonds.

In this immersive VR action-adventure, you will face multiple challenges as you progress through the dark city landscape. As you fight automated drones and unwielding cyborgs, the path to human freedom lies in your hands. Do you have what it takes to return order to this cyberpunk dystopia?
